Quest.Name: Four Heads are Better than None

CustomBehavior.Text: Waiting for Zepp to Twilight Highlands - do not interact with toon!
We're on the Zepp to TH, waiting - do not interact with the toon!
The "Madness" quest (http://wowhead.com/quest=26549) is frequently bugged.\nIt looks like you are an unforunate soul for whom it failed. We're abandoning the quest to try again.

CustomBehavior.Text: Talk with the Lt and escort the squad to Calen, just get passed the gate and walk the road to get credit\nTalk with Calen passed the gate\nI used my flying mount and flew on the left side of the mountains for less agro
